name: geopolitical-risk-gcloud
description: Geopolitical Risk Analysis for Market Pulse Daily using Google Cloud

scripts.deploy:generator: gcloud functions deploy geopoliticalRiskGenerator --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point generateGeopoliticalRiskAnalysis --timeout=540s --memory=512MB --source=./functions/generator --set-env-vars-file .env
scripts.deploy:api: gcloud functions deploy geopoliticalRiskAPI --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point getGeopoliticalRiskAnalysis --timeout=60s --memory=256MB --source=./functions/api --set-env-vars-file .env
